pages.text: $(l)Brok and Sindri Shop$() is a rare structure, nestled within the frosty expanses of winter biomes and the dense, evergreen taiga. $(br2)Resembling a camp more than a traditional shop, it is here that you can forge profitable trade relations with the legendary Huldra brothers.
$(br)To aid in your quest, the brothers have invented a special $(l)Dwarven Compass$(), designed to guide you to their elusive shops with ease.
